trans-unit.source: Defines an interface for a page designer component to obtain services from a designer host such as Visual Studio 2005 at design time.
trans-unit.target: Define uma interface para um componente do designer de página obter serviços de um host de designer, como Visual Studio 2005 em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).

trans-unit.source: All methods in this interface are to be implemented by the design host and made available to designer components through this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices> interface.
trans-unit.target: Todos os métodos nessa interface devem ser implementadas pelo host de design e disponibilizado para os componentes do designer nesta <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices> interface.

trans-unit.source: Before attempting to use the methods in a custom designer component, verify that the design host actually implements the interface.
trans-unit.target: Antes de tentar usar os métodos em um componente de designer personalizado, verifique se que o host de design, na verdade, implementa a interface.

trans-unit.source: Clears all items in the designer host's **Undo** cache at design time.
trans-unit.target: Limpa todos os itens no cache **Desfazer** do host de designer em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).

trans-unit.source: Since the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices.ClearUndoStack%2A> method is implemented by the designer host, verify that it exists before invoking it.
trans-unit.target: Desde o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices.ClearUndoStack%2A> método é implementado pelo host do designer, verifique se ele existe antes de invocá-lo.

trans-unit.source: The ID for the container control.
trans-unit.target: A ID para o controle de contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The key for the cache item.
trans-unit.target: A chave para o item de cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets an item from the cache of the designer host at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um item do cache do host de designer em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).

trans-unit.source: An object from the cache of the designer host.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto do cache do host de designer.

trans-unit.source: Since the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices.GetCache%2A> method is implemented by the designer host, verify that it exists before invoking it.
trans-unit.target: Desde o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices.GetCache%2A> método é implementado pelo host do designer, verifique se ele existe antes de invocá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the page in the designer host at design time.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza a página no host de designer em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).

trans-unit.source: Since the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices.RefreshPageView%2A> method is implemented by the designer host, verify that it exists before invoking it.
trans-unit.target: Desde o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices.RefreshPageView%2A> método é implementado pelo host do designer, verifique se ele existe antes de invocá-lo.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the container control.
trans-unit.target: A ID do controle de contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The key for the cache item.
trans-unit.target: A chave para o item de cache.

trans-unit.source: The item to store in the cache.
trans-unit.target: O item a armazenar em cache.

trans-unit.source: Stores an object in the designer host's cache at design time.
trans-unit.target: Armazena um objeto no cache do host de designer em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).

trans-unit.source: The container control with which to begin the update.
trans-unit.target: O controle de contêiner com o qual iniciar a atualização.

trans-unit.source: Recursively updates the associated control and each of its child controls in the design host at design time.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza recursivamente o controle associado e cada um de seus controles filho no host de design em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.
